title: Algebraic models for equivariant rational homotopy theory for discrete groups
summary: We provide a framework which generalizes algebraic models of a homotopy theory of spaces to the genuine equivariant case for a discrete group. We explain how this applies to commutative differential graded algebra (cdga) models and complete differential graded Lie algebra models for rational spaces. We compare the cdga model to other model categories in the literature.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个框架，将代数模型从普通同伦理论推广到离散群的真正等变情况，特别适用于有理空间的cdga和dgl模型。
AI.motivation: 将代数模型（如cdga和dgl）从普通同伦理论扩展到等变情况，为离散群作用下的空间提供代数模型框架。
AI.method: 建立了一个推广代数模型的框架，适用于离散群的真正等变情况，特别关注有理空间的cdga模型和完全微分分次李代数模型。
AI.result: 提出了一个统一的等变代数模型框架，并将cdga模型与文献中的其他模型范畴进行比较。
AI.conclusion: 该框架成功地将代数模型推广到等变情况，为离散群作用下的空间提供了有效的代数建模工具。

title: Symplectic quandle Method and $SL(2,\mathbb C)$-representations of 2-bridge Knots
summary: In this paper, we extend the symplectic quandle method, previously employed in our study of parabolic representations of knot groups, to investigate the general $SL(2,\mathbb{C})$-representations of 2-bridge ``kmot" groups. We introduce a `generalized symplectic quandle structure' corresponding to ($\mathcal{D}_M$, conjugation) for each $M\in\mathbb C\setminus \{0,1,-1\}$, where $\mathcal{D}_M=\{A\in SL(2,\mathbb{C})\mid tr(A)= M+M^{-1} \}$. By converting the system of conjugation quandle equations to that of generalized symplectic quandle equations, we obtain a simpler expression for the 2-variable Riley polynomial and derive some recursive formulas for Riley polynomials and Alexander polynomials. This approach enables us to effectively compute the A-polynomials, allowing us to obtain numerous previously unknown A-polynomials within minutes using Mathematica.

AI.tldr: 将辛四元组方法扩展到研究2桥"kmot"群的SL(2,C)表示，引入广义辛四元组结构，简化Riley多项式表达式，实现高效计算A-多项式
AI.motivation: 之前使用辛四元组方法研究结点群的抛物表示，现在希望将此方法扩展到研究更一般的2桥"kmot"群的SL(2,C)表示，以获得更有效的计算工具
AI.method: 为每个M∈C\{0,1,-1}引入广义辛四元组结构(𝒟_M,共轭)，将共轭四元组方程组转换为广义辛四元组方程组，从而简化2变量Riley多项式表达式，推导Riley多项式和Alexander多项式的递归公式
AI.result: 获得了更简单的2变量Riley多项式表达式，推导了Riley多项式和Alexander多项式的递归公式，能够使用Mathematica在几分钟内计算出许多先前未知的A-多项式
AI.conclusion: 广义辛四元组方法为研究2桥"kmot"群的SL(2,C)表示提供了有效的计算框架，显著提高了A-多项式的计算效率

title: Notes on Tate cohomology
summary: We formulate a definition of Tate cohomology in the context of three functor formalisms, and we establish basic monoidality and functoriality properties of it in this context. Our approach to these properties is based on the treatment of Nikolaus-Scholze in the setting of local systems of spectra on spaces. We discuss a couple of other specific settings of interest that are accommodated by our generalization.

AI.tldr: 本文在三种函子形式主义背景下定义了Tate上同调，并建立了其基本幺半性和函子性性质，基于Nikolaus-Scholze在谱局部系统上的处理方法。
AI.motivation: 将Nikolaus-Scholze在谱局部系统上处理Tate上同调的方法推广到更一般的三种函子形式主义框架中，以容纳更多具体应用场景。
AI.method: 在三种函子形式主义背景下制定Tate上同调的定义，基于Nikolaus-Scholze的方法建立幺半性和函子性性质，并讨论该推广能够容纳的具体应用场景。
AI.result: 成功将Tate上同调的定义推广到三种函子形式主义框架，建立了其基本幺半性和函子性性质，并展示了该推广能够覆盖多个具体应用场景。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一个在三种函子形式主义中定义Tate上同调的通用框架，继承了Nikolaus-Scholze方法的优点，为更广泛的应用场景提供了理论基础。

title: Skeins, $q$-series, and modularity
summary: We study BPS $q$-series associated to 3-manifolds decorated by a line defect along an embedded link. We prove that these $q$-series depend only on the class of the link in the skein module, thereby defining a homomorphism from the skein module to the space of $q$-series. The image of this homomorphism is conjectured to be holomorphically quantum modular, which suggests a new approach to Langlands duality for skein modules through $q$-series.

AI.tldr: 证明3-流形上带线缺陷的BPS q-级数只依赖于链环在skein模中的等价类，从而定义了从skein模到q-级数空间的同态
AI.motivation: 研究3-流形上带线缺陷的BPS q-级数，探索其与skein模的关系，为通过q-级数研究skein模的Langlands对偶性提供新途径
AI.method: 证明这些q-级数只依赖于链环在skein模中的等价类，从而构造从skein模到q-级数空间的同态映射
AI.result: 成功证明了BPS q-级数只依赖于链环的skein等价类，建立了skein模与q-级数空间之间的同态关系
AI.conclusion: 该同态的像被猜想为全纯量子模形式，这为通过q-级数研究skein模的Langlands对偶性提供了新方法

title: Stratified Morse Theory for Cell Complexes
summary: We develop a version of discrete Morse theory for finite regular CW complexes equipped with an auxiliary stratification. The key construction is the halo of a cell, which contains all those faces in the boundary that enter closed sublevelsets precisely when the threshold reaches that cell's value. The complement of this halo in the boundary, called the shadow, is always a subcomplex. A stratified discrete Morse function requires Forman's conditions on each stratum together with the requirement that closures of paired cells admit filtered collapses onto their shadows. We establish fundamental Morse lemmas: filtered collapses across regular intervals, and controlled attachments at critical values. For functions satisfying only the stratum-wise Forman condition, we construct an upper envelope on the barycentric subdivision whose local Morse data decomposes into horizontal and vertical components. This yields a simplicial analogue of the standard tangential-normal splitting of local Morse data in the sense of Goresky and MacPherson.

AI.tldr: 本文发展了有限正则CW复形上带辅助分层的离散Morse理论，引入了halo和shadow概念，建立了分层离散Morse函数的基本引理，并在重心细分上构造了局部Morse数据的水平-垂直分解。
AI.motivation: 传统离散Morse理论主要处理单纯复形，本文旨在将其扩展到带分层的有限正则CW复形，以更精细地分析分层结构下的拓扑性质。
AI.method: 引入halo（包含边界中在阈值达到该胞元值时进入闭子水平集的所有面）和shadow（边界中halo的补集）概念；定义分层离散Morse函数，要求满足各层上的Forman条件且配对胞元的闭包允许过滤坍缩到其shadow；在重心细分上构造上包络。
AI.result: 建立了基本Morse引理：正则区间上的过滤坍缩和临界值处的受控附着；对于仅满足层内Forman条件的函数，构造了局部Morse数据可分解为水平和垂直分量的上包络，得到了类似Goresky-MacPherson切向-法向分裂的单纯类似物。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将离散Morse理论扩展到分层正则CW复形，提供了分析分层结构拓扑性质的新工具，特别是通过halo-shadow构造和局部Morse数据的分解，为分层空间的研究提供了离散框架。

title: An Extension of the $sl(n)$ Polynomial to Knotted 4-Valent Graphs
summary: We use planar 4-valent graphs and a graphical calculus involving such graphs to construct an invariant for balanced-oriented, knotted 4-valent graphs. Our invariant is an extension of the $sl(n)$ polynomial for classical knots and links. We also provide a minimal generating set of Reidemeister-type moves for diagrams of balanced-oriented, knotted 4-valent graphs.

AI.tldr: 该论文利用平面4价图和图形演算构建了平衡定向4价扭结图的扩展不变量，推广了经典扭结的sl(n)多项式，并给出了此类图的Reidemeister型移动的最小生成集。
AI.motivation: 研究4价扭结图的不变量理论，将经典扭结的sl(n)多项式推广到更复杂的4价图结构，为这类拓扑对象建立系统的代数不变量理论。
AI.method: 使用平面4价图和图形演算技术，通过构造性方法建立平衡定向4价扭结图的不变量，并系统推导此类图的Reidemeister型移动的最小生成集。
AI.result: 成功构建了平衡定向4价扭结图的不变量，该不变量是经典扭结sl(n)多项式的自然推广；同时确定了此类图Reidemeister型移动的最小生成集。
AI.conclusion: 该工作扩展了扭结理论到4价图结构，建立了系统的代数不变量理论框架，为研究更复杂的拓扑结构提供了新的工具和方法。

title: Graphical composition of mapping spaces between modules of configuration-space-type
summary:
In embedding calculus, spaces of embeddings are identified with derived mapping spaces between framed Fulton-MacPherson-type modules (framed configuration spaces). Unfortunately, there are no sufficiently good algebraic models for framed Fulton-MacPherson modules that would allow us to explicitly describe the rational homotopy type of the embedding space. Recently there were several attempts to avoid dealing with the framed versions of Fulton-MacPherson modules by considering framed manifolds, e.g. embeddings modulo immersions $\overline{\mathrm{Emb}}$ in a recent paper by Fresse, Turchin and Willwacher, or embeddings with a deformation of the framing $\widetilde{\mathrm{Emb}}$ in a recent paper by the author. In both cases, the rational homotopy type of the corresponding embedding space has an explicit description in terms of graphs (hairy graph complexes).
  We construct a combinatorial graphical composition for the composition of embedding spaces $\widetilde{\mathrm{Emb}}$. As a step on our way, we describe the action of the coinduction functor on configuration-space-type $e_n^c$-comodules.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了嵌入空间组合的图形组合方法，通过配置空间型e_n^c-余模上的余归纳函子作用，为带框架变形的嵌入空间提供了显式描述。
AI.motivation: 在嵌入演算中，嵌入空间与带框架的Fulton-MacPherson型模之间的派生映射空间等同，但缺乏足够好的代数模型来显式描述嵌入空间的有理同伦类型。最近的研究试图通过考虑带框架流形来避免处理带框架的Fulton-MacPherson模。
AI.method: 构建嵌入空间的组合图形组合方法，描述配置空间型e_n^c-余模上余归纳函子的作用，作为实现嵌入空间组合的关键步骤。
AI.result: 为带框架变形的嵌入空间构造了组合图形组合，使得嵌入空间的有理同伦类型能够用图形（多毛图复形）显式描述。
AI.conclusion: 通过组合图形方法和余归纳函子作用的分析，为嵌入空间提供了更显式的代数描述，推进了嵌入演算中代数模型的发展。

title: Unknotting number and connected sums: The knots $4_1$ and $5_1$
summary: We show that the knots $K\in\{4_1,5_1\}$ can be paired with a corresponding knot $K^\prime$ such that $u(K\#K^\prime)<u(K)+u(K^\prime)$. As a consequence unknotting number fails to be additive for these knots. We also provide a candidate knot $K^\prime$ for the knot $3_1$.

AI.tldr: 对于结$4_1$和$5_1$，存在对应的结$K^\prime$使得连通和的解结数小于各自解结数之和，证明了解结数对这些结不满足可加性；对结$3_1$也提出了候选$K^\prime$。
AI.motivation: 研究结理论中解结数（unknotting number）的可加性问题，即连通和（connected sum）的解结数是否等于各自解结数之和。这是一个基础但重要的结不变量性质问题。
AI.method: 通过构造具体的结配对，对于结$4_1$和$5_1$，找到对应的结$K^\prime$，计算$K\#K^\prime$的解结数，并与$u(K)+u(K^\prime)$比较。
AI.result: 证明了对于结$4_1$和$5_1$，存在$K^\prime$使得$u(K\#K^\prime)<u(K)+u(K^\prime)$，因此解结数对这些结不满足可加性。对结$3_1$也提出了候选结$K^\prime$。
AI.conclusion: 解结数作为结不变量，其可加性在某些情况下不成立，这对理解结不变量的代数性质有重要意义，并为进一步研究解结数的可加性问题提供了具体反例。

title: On Extremal Volume Projections of the Simplex and the Cube
summary: Let $Δ_n$ and $Q_n$ denote the regular $n$-simplex of side length $\sqrt{2}$ embedded in $\mathbb{R}^{n+1}$ and the volume one cube in $\mathbb{R}^n$, respectively. We derive a closed-form formula for the hyperplane volume projections of $Δ_n$, which also yields the directions achieving the extremal volume. Moreover, we revisit the problem of extremal planar projections of $Q_n$. In addition, we present generalizations within the framework of $L_p$-projection bodies.

AI.tldr: 本文推导了n维单纯形超平面体积投影的闭式公式，并重新研究了立方体极值平面投影问题，同时推广到L_p投影体框架中。
AI.motivation: 研究高维几何体的投影体积问题，特别是寻找极值投影方向和相应的投影体积公式，这对于凸几何和泛函分析具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用几何分析和凸优化方法，推导n维单纯形超平面投影的闭式公式，重新分析立方体的平面投影问题，并在L_p投影体框架下进行推广。
AI.result: 得到了n维单纯形超平面体积投影的精确闭式表达式，确定了达到极值体积的投影方向，对立方体平面投影问题提供了新的见解。
AI.conclusion: 本文解决了高维单纯形投影体积的计算问题，扩展了极值投影理论，为L_p投影体框架下的相关问题提供了理论基础。

title: Hyperkähler bases for six rational bordism theories
summary: We use tori and Hilbert schemes of K3 surfaces to construct explicit bases for the real, complex, and quaternionic versions of rational symplectic and rational Spin bordism. The key input to our work is a theorem of Oberdieck, Song, and Voisin on the Milnor genus of Hilbert schemes of K3s.

AI.tldr: 利用K3曲面的环面和Hilbert概形，为有理辛和有理Spin配边理论的实、复、四元数版本构造了显式基。
AI.motivation: 为有理辛和有理Spin配边理论提供显式的几何构造，利用K3曲面及其Hilbert概形的特殊性质来构建这些配边理论的基。
AI.method: 使用K3曲面的环面和Hilbert概形作为构造工具，关键依赖于Oberdieck、Song和Voisin关于K3曲面Hilbert概形的Milnor亏格定理。
AI.result: 成功构造了有理辛和有理Spin配边理论的实、复、四元数版本的显式基，为这些理论提供了具体的几何实现。
AI.conclusion: K3曲面及其Hilbert概形为构造有理辛和有理Spin配边理论的基提供了有效的几何框架，Oberdieck-Song-Voisin定理在其中发挥了关键作用。

title: Restoring Wasserstein Rigidity with a single point
summary: We consider isometrically flexible Wasserstein spaces and demonstrate that adding a single point to the underlying metric space makes these Wasserstein spaces rigid.

AI.tldr: 在等距可弯曲的Wasserstein空间中，向底层度量空间添加一个点会使这些空间变得刚性
AI.motivation: 研究Wasserstein空间的等距灵活性，探索在底层度量空间添加点对空间刚性的影响
AI.method: 通过向底层度量空间添加单个点，分析Wasserstein空间等距性质的变化
AI.result: 证明添加一个点就能使原本等距可弯曲的Wasserstein空间变得刚性
AI.conclusion: 底层度量空间的微小变化（添加单个点）能显著改变Wasserstein空间的等距性质，使其从可弯曲变为刚性
